login.description: Login API is used for login courier to 6Connect system. This API requires two parameters and on success it will return the access key.

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

AuthCode.description: The token return by the server to be use for calling other API.

json.msg: Login Failed invalid email or password

get profile.description: Get profile API is used for get profile info of courier from 6Connect system. It only needs the Access key.

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

courier.description: A courier object with its id, email, company abbreviation, description, registered address, billing address, full name, registered number, phone number, fax number, support email and whether it have been approved by the admin.

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

exist.description: A true will be returned if user exist, otherwise a false will be returned if user don't exist.

Check User exists.description: Check user exists API is used for check the specific user name whether it exists or not. This API requires one parameter.

code.description: Result of the request (0 for Success)

access_key.description: A new token will be returned.

reset access key.description: Reset access key API is used for reset the current access key. It only needs the access key and return new access key generated from the 6Connect system.

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

statuses.description: An JSON Array of status object with status_id and the name to represent the id.

List statuses.description: List statuses API is used for list all statuses used in 6Connect system. This API requires no parameters.

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

Register Courier.description: This API requires 4 mandatory parameters - email, name, password, and description.

support_email.description: Help-line email address of the courier

code.description: Result code of the request(Success is 0)

update courier.description: Update courier API is used for update existing courier data in 6Connect system.

code.description: Result of the request(Success for 0)

services.description: A JSON array of "service" JSON Object. The "service" JSON Object contains the id,service_id,display_name,service_type,price,start_time,end_time,week_0 to week_6, origin, destination, description, threshold_price, is_for_bidding, status, org-Status, courier_id, auto_approve,is_public parameters

list courier services.description: List services API is used for list currently added services to 6Connect System. It only needs the access key.

company_id.description: organisation ID which you have to check whether exist or not. (mandatory)

code.description: Result of the request(Success for 0)

Check company exists.description: Check company exists API is used for check the specific organisation whether it exists or not. This API requires one parameter.

company.description: Filter results to jobs from a specific company by company name/ oraganisation name

username.description: Filter results to jobs from a specific user by username

search.description: Search string to search in public order ID, username, company name, or order details

collection_address.description: String to search in collection address

delivery_address.description: String to search in delivery address

collection_date_from.description: Time to filter jobs having collection time starts later than provided

collection_date_to.description: Time to filter jobs having collection time within provided

delivery_date_from.description: Date to filter jobs having delivery date starts later than provided.

delivery_date_to.description: Date to filter jobs having delivery date within provided

delivery_time_from.description: Time to filter jobs having delivery time starts later than provided time.

delivery_time_to.description: Time to filter jobs having delivery time within provided.

code.description: Result code of request(0 for Success)

jobs.description: JSON Array of "job" JSON Object. Each "job" contains id,public_id,display_name,username,company_name,height,breadth,length,volume,weight,collection_address,crestrict,collection_date_from,collection_time_from,collection_date_to,collection_time_to,delivery_date_from,delivery_time_from,delivery_date_to,delivery_time_to,collection_country,delivery_address,delivery_post_code,delivery_country,drestrict,collection_post_code,created_date

list jobs.description: List jobs API is used for list jobs that are available for bidding. This list includes jobs placed for open bidding and jobs from organisation in which you are a pre-approved courier. This API consists of many parameters to filter the list, but no one is mandatory.

code.description: Result for request (0 for Success)

get job detail.description: Get job detail API is used for get all details of a job. This API requires only one parameter.

jobs.remarks: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

username.description: Filter results to jobs from a specific company by company name/organisation name.

search.description: Search string to search in public order ID, username, company name, or order details

collection_address.description: String to search in public collection address

delivery_address.description: String to search in delivery address

collection_date_from.description: Date to filter jobs having collcetion date starts later than provided

collection_date_to.description: Date to filter jobs having collection date within provided

collection_time_from.description: Time to filter jobs having collection time starts later than provided

collection_time_to.description: Time to filter jobs having collection time within provided

delivery_date_from.description: Date to filter jobs having delivery date starts later than provided

delivery_date_to.description: Date to filter jobs having delivery date within provided

delivery_time_from.description: Time to filter jobs having delivery time starts later than provided

delivery_time_to.description: Time to filter jobs having delivery time within provided

status_id.description: Job status ID to filter by status

code.description: Result of the request(0 for Success)

jobs.description: Array of the Job JSON Object

List won jobs.description: List won jobs API is used for list jobs that are awarded to the courier either by direct assign or by won bid.

code.description: Result of the Request (0 for Success)

List job messages.description: List job messages API is used for list all the messages related to a specific job. This API requires only one parameter. This will return all the comments by the person who added this order and all questions by you as well as all the responded questions from other couriers.

message.description: The actual text you want to send. (mandatory)

code.description: Result of Request(0 for Success)

Leave a message.description: Leave a message API is used for send message to 6Connect system regarding a specific job. This API requires two parameters.

consignment_id.description: The consignment id in couriers own system, so that company is able to inquire the delivery status in couriers system (mandatory)

price.description: price for the job (mandatory if its an directly assigned job)

code.description: Result of Request(0 for Success)

Acknowledge Job.description: Acknowledge job API is used to acknowledge the job, when courier successfully bid a job or a job directly assigned to courier. This API consists of three parameters.

remark.description: The reason of changing the price (mandatory)

price.description: price for the job (mandatory if its an directly assigned job)

code.description: Result of Request(0 for Success)

Adjust Price.description: Adjust price API is used for submit a new price for a won job, but the price needs to be approved by company. If courier sent the price which is same as previous, it will return API_FAILED. This API consists of three parameters.

List price history.description: List price history API is used for list the price that courier submitted before. This API requires only the job_id as parameter.

status_code.additional info:
status_code can only be the following at the moment: request must set the codes correct or it will be an error.
  • Collecting - 101
  • Collected - 102
  • In-Transit - 301
  • Delivered - 401
  • Failed Delivery - 501
  • Others - 601

description.description: The current status description that needs company to know (mandatory)

code.descripton: Result of the Request (0 for Success)

Submit Job track.description:
Submit job track API is used for submit current job status to 6Connect, then company is able to track the actual delivery status. These update will update the order delivery status.
Collecting - 101
Collected - 102
In-Transit - 301
Delivered - 401
Failed Delivery - 501
Others

json.message: Failed to submit job state. No permission

service_id.description: Service using which you are bidding (mandatory)

code.description: Result for Request (0 for Success)

bid for job.description: Bid for job API is used for bidding of current open job/order in the connect platform. Courier may submit a bid multiple times as long as the job is still open.

code.description: Result for Request (0 for Success)

withdraw bid.description: Withdraw bid API is used to give up an existing bid, company wont see your price in the order. This API only requires the bid ID which you have to withdraw.

company.description: Filter results to jobs from a specific company by company name/ organisation name

username.description: Filter results to jobs from a specific user by username

collection_address.description: String to search in collection address

delivery_address.description: String to search in delivery address

collection_date_from.description: Date to filter jobs having collection date starts later than provided

collection_date_to.description: Date to filter jobs having collection date within provided

delivery_date_from.description: Date to filter jobs having delivery date starts later than provided

delivery_date_to.description: Date to filter jobs having delivery date within provided

delivery_time_to.description: Time to filter jobs having delivery time within provided

code.description: Result of request(0 for Success)

List history bidding jobs.description: List history bidding jobs API is used for retrieve all bids from a courier stored in the platform. This API has several parameters to filter the return list.

jobs.display_name: Next Business Day delivery (10am - 6pm) - Small Parcel

service_id.description: Service using which you are bidding (mandatory)

code.description: Result for Request (0 for Success)

Bid service request.description: Bid service request API is used for bid for a current open service request in the connect platform. Courier may submit a bid multiple times as long as the request is still open.

code.description: Result for Request (0 for Success)

Withdraw service request bid.description: Withdraw bid API is used to give up an existing bid, company wont see your bid no longer. This API only requires the bid ID which you have to withdraw.

code.description: Result of Request (0 for Success)

List service request bids.description: List service request bids API is used for retrieve all service request bids from a courier stored in the platform.

code.description: Result for Request (0 for Success)

messages.description: JSON Array of message JSON Object

List request messages.description: List request messages API is used for list all the messages related to a specific service request. This API requires only one parameter. This will return all the comments by the admin member who added this request and all questions by you as well as all the responded questions from other couriers.

message.description: The actual text you want to send. (mandatory)

code.description: Result of the Request (0 for Success)

Leave a message for service request.description: Leave a message for service request API is used for send message to 6Connect system regarding a specific service request. This API requires two parameters.

List requests for pre-approved services.description: List requests for pre-approved services API is used list the requests from different organisations for pre-approved services. This API requires only the access key. You can pass search string as a parameter for filtering.

requests.service: Next Business Day delivery (10am - 6pm) - Small Parcel

Approve request for pre-approved service.description: Approve request for pre-approved services API is used for assign a service to an organisation based on the request from organisation admin member. This action will reject all other requests for this particular service from other organisations automatically. This API requires one parameter.

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

Reject request for pre-approved services.description: Reject request for pre-approved services API is used for reject request from an organisation admin member to add a service as pre-approved service for their organisation. This API requires two parameters.

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

Update Proof of Delivery.description: Update Proof of Delivery API is to update any files related to the POD. If the image is a signature, it should be indicated. This API requires five parameters.

pod_image.description: Image that is going to attach through api , this will automatically generated when you choose a file to upload. (Mandatory)

filename.description: Original file name. This will automatically be filled when you choose a file to upload.

is_sign.description: Flag to indicate signature or other image (mandatory)

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

AuthCode.description: The token return by the server to be use for calling other API.

json.message: Failed to update POD. No permission

company.description: 6Connect organisation ID, set this parameter if this service need to be assigned to specific organisation. If this is not provided, it means the service is meant for bidding purposes. (mandatory)

week.description: available days on week, ex: "1,2,3,4,5" ,0 Sunday, 1 Monday, 2 Tuesday, 3 Wednesday, 4 Thursday, 5 Friday, 6 Saturday (mandatory)

code.description: Result of the response (0 for Success)

push services.description:
Push services API is used for add one or multiple services to 6Connect. Each service must be in a JSON array format
- If a service has never been used before, it will be replaced permanently.
- If a service has been used before, it will suspend the previous old one and create a new record.
(Whether a service has been used before is based on the submitted service id by the courier)

service_id.description: Service id that already added in system (mandatory)

company.description: ID of the organisation to which currently this service is assigned (mandatory)

code.description: Result of the Response(0 for Success)

remove service.description: Remove service API is used for remove assigned services from a specific organisation. This API requires two parameters.

service_id.description: Service id that already added in system (mandatory)

company.description: ID of the organisation to which currently this service is assigned (mandatory)

code.description: Result of the response

assign service.description: Assign service API is used for assigning a service to specific organisation. This API requires two parameters.

code.description: Result of the Response(0 for Success)

requests.description: A JSONArray of search requests Object

List service request.description: List service request API is used for list all service requests available for bidding. This API consists of one parameter.
